_sText:
CS_SCREW by Prabab / Kamil Wolter (released May 2011)

"This map, while using a simple concept, is perfectly done. The various small levels composing it are all connected to a central pit. With a layout such as this, set aside your old habits and quickly learn to look up and down. If you don't, you won't live long.

As the map is very small, the rounds will not last long. It is impossible to be lost as every passages lead to the central pit... where everyone life-span is short, very short.

And don't forget: we are in CS:S, so you can fall from any height into 2 inches of water and you won't take any damage at all."

- from review at NetDay.be

About Playing with Bots: NAV-file for playing against the Bots (embedded in .bsp-file) are more or less playable, though isn't optimized manually.

Good Luck and Happy Frags! Also Great Thanks to Prabab for his Nice Work.
